Name: 武儒绘卷 - 天地奇缘
About the game: 'Wuru Painting Scroll - Romance of Heaven and Earth' is a development game with a mythological background. Players can formulate their own development routes in the game, or defend their homeland and the country, fight in all directions, or seek wisdom and courage, and be companions with chinese masters. Game Features Manipulate a character, choose your growth line and develop it Many playable mini-games Compared with the previous work, there are large hints in the art Note: This work contains the people and events that happened between the three realms of heaven and earth, so it's a 'magic predestined relationship between heaven and earth'.
